name: Data Thief (itch) (Lieutenant Games)
description:
Overview:

Help our hero to escape alive from the evil clutches of the evil corporation!

There is an evil corporation which is making the world a really worse place to live. You have managed to steal secret information from them, which will be vital for taking them down. Now you have to escape alive from their pursue.

Controls:

  • Keyboard Arrows: Move;
  • F key: Shoot;
  • Left mouse button click/touch screen: Move towards clicked/touched point;
  • Left mouse button click/touch screen: Shoot;

Observations:

  • This game was made targeting QVGA resolution (320x240).
  • This game was made for the 2014's March's "Cyber Punk Jam", whose theme was to make a cyber punk related game inspired by a given image.

Hashtags:

#cyberpunkjam
